name: Stars Force
description:
STARS FORCE is a unit created to fight space pirates. In whatever star system the crime occurs, "STARS FORCE" is in a hurry to put things in order!
The player will play as the pilot of a warship fighting hordes of space pirates.

Several types of ships and weapons. Collecting items and breaking capsules, you can pump your ship.

Features:
  • Pumping the ship
  • 10 types of enemy ships
  • 15 levels
  • 3 locations
  • bosses
